<!-- DO NOT EDIT | GENERATED CONTENT -->
# open

Open a workspace

## Usage

```console
coder open
```

## Subcommands

| Name                                        | Purpose                              |
|---------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------|
| [<code>vscode</code>](./open_vscode.md)     | Open a workspace in VS Code Desktop  |
| [<code>cursor</code>](./open_cursor.md)     | Open a workspace in Cursor Desktop   |
| [<code>windsurf</code>](./open_windsurf.md) | Open a workspace in Windsurf Desktop |
| [<code>fleet</code>](./open_fleet.md)       | Open a workspace in JetBrains Fleet  |
| [<code>zed</code>](./open_zed.md)           | Open a workspace in Zed              |
